name: vola-n8n-agent-hotels
description: VolaBot - AI-powered travel consultant for hotel recommendations using N8N workflow automation

scripts.dev: npm run sync-prompt && npm run validate
scripts.deploy-prep: npm run sync-prompt && npm run validate && echo '✅ Ready for N8N deployment'
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run organize && npm run sync-prompt && npm run validate
scripts.help:
echo 'VolaBot Development Commands:
  sync-prompt  - Update JSON with MAIN_PROMPT.md content
  validate     - Validate workflow structure
  organize     - Organize test data files
  dev          - Sync + validate (development workflow)
  deploy-prep  - Full preparation for deployment
  backup       - Create timestamped backup
  setup        - Initial project setup
  help         - Show this help'

author: VolaBot Development Team
